skills.name: GRUEL
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Cleanse and Heal allies inflicted with Blind or Taunt effects.
• 50% Chance to grant Armor Penetration to all allies for 2 turns.
• 15% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: DRAMATIC ESCAPE
desc: • Heal all allies based on the number of negative effects on each ally.
• Cleanse negative effects, including Silver Effects from all allies.
